subject: Horses
Horse Racing
Breeders' Cup (Horse Races)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Two owners and a trainer from Mongolia are applying their traditions and skill to thoroughbred racing, with their horse Mongolian Saturday winning the Breeders' Cup Turf Sprint in October.
snippet: Two owners and a trainer from Mongolia are applying their traditions and skill to thoroughbred racing, with their horse Mongolian Saturday winning the Breeders' Cup Turf Sprint in October.
